title: Bagels and Beans - Statenkwartier
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain of lunchrooms, this branch is located opposite to Frederik Hendrikplein, close to the shopping street Frederik Hendriklaan in Statenkwartier area. Offers some vegetarian and vegan bagels plus sweets, coffee with soymilk option, fresh juices. Uses some fair-trade and organic ingredients. Free Wi-Fi.
